title: DataSegmentValidator
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Validator of , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=DataSegment, value=kwasm.ast.module.DataSegment) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= nodes.

From the docs:

  • The memory C.mems[x] must be defined in the context.
  • The expression expr must be valid with result type [i32].
  • The expression expr must be constant.
  • Then the data segment is valid.
, value=null)
